Discover Himalayan Hospitality Where People Make the Place

Welcome to the heart of the Himalayas, where the warmth of the people is as breathtaking as the scenery. Our travel website is dedicated to showcasing the unparalleled hospitality and rich culture of the Himalayan region through our unique properties. Each of our three hotels offers a distinctive experience, blending the natural beauty of the mountains with the welcoming spirit of the locals.

Ravangla Star

Nestled in the serene valleys, Ravangla Star is a sanctuary of peace and tranquility. This property boasts a range of rooms designed to provide comfort while immersing you in the local culture.

Mountain View Suites:

Wake up to the majestic views of the Himalayan peaks. These suites are elegantly furnished with local artisanal décor, offering a perfect blend of luxury and authenticity.

Heritage Rooms:

Step back in time with our Heritage Rooms, adorned with traditional artifacts and antique furnishings. These rooms tell the stories of the region’s rich history and vibrant culture.

Eco Cottages:

For the environmentally conscious traveler, our Eco Cottages are an ideal choice. Built with sustainable materials, these cottages offer a cozy and intimate stay, surrounded by the natural beauty of the Himalayas.
